page.title: 17ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
page.content: The information for the data count survey for the area with grid reference 02480060 was compiled by pupils fromWidewell Primary School, Plymouth, and Notre Dame Comprehensive School, Plymouth The text pages were written mainly by pupils from Class 8 of Widewell Primary School, whose names are recorded below. Lee Luxton, Mathew Callaghan,Iain Tattersall,Colin Bales, Charles Gillespie, Gary Wade,Richard Brooks,Ian Caddy,Lisa Dyer,Mark Barrass,Michael Watson,Phillip Derrick, Carla Hicks,Rachel Burn,Alison Taylor,Andrew Norgate,James Langton. Victoria McCarthy of Notre Dame wrote a page. Mr R.Griffiths,a parent, took the photographs.
